name: Starians
overview: A scrolling screen platform game, created by Joakim Wigström that was released on Amigo! coverdisk issue 02/93. Collect up the diamonds and other treasures, avoid the spikes and baddies. Shoot the baddies when you can, jump them when you cannot. Each level has a 100 second timer, so be fast or do it again. FEATURES: - Full load from HD - Files can be packed with Propack or IMP! - Blitter waits fixed (6x) - Keyboard routine added - Trainer option added (set CUSTOM1=1 for unlimited lives) - ROM/NI icon (created by JHZ) - Quit option (your default key)
